root.name: Moai No Hihou
root.description: The player carries a hammer that is used to destroy rock formations. These formations make up part of the puzzle to reach the exit of each level, and if they are not destroyed correctly the exit may become unreachable. Hidden inside some rocks are special items to help reach the exit. In addition to the puzzle aspect there is a time limit and enemies to avoid. In bonus stages you collect diamonds within a time limit.
